name: AURA ALTO PENDANT
description: The Aura Alto Pendant emits an elegant glow that is diffused by a satin white acrylic outer ring. The inner ring is composed of cold-rolled steel and is finished with a plated or powder coat finish. The Aura Alto Pendant works beautifully in larger configurations or can be used as a stand-alone pendant.

name: AURA PENDANT
description: The Aura Pendant emits an elegant glow that is diffused by a satin white acrylic inner ring. The outer ring is composed of cold-rolled steel and is finished with a plated or powder coat finish. The Aura Pendant works beautifully in larger configurations or can be used as a stand-alone pendant.

name: AURA SLIM PENDANT
description: The Aura Slim Pendant emits an elegant glow that is diffused by a minimal satin white acrylic inner ring. The outer ring is composed of cold-rolled steel and can be finished in plated or powder coat options. The Aura Slim Pendant works beautifully in larger configurations or can be used as a stand-alone pendant.

name: BAMBOO WALL SCONCE
description: The BAMBOO series is wittingly composed of bamboo skewers giving it an organic feel. The BAMBOO Sconce has a bushed cold rolled steel belt detail that wraps the fixture, giving it a minimal yet contemporary edge. The bamboo diffuser is backed by a clear glass to displace the heat from the incandescent bulb.

name: BAR WALL SCONCE
description: The BAR Wall Sconce is an elegant fixture that is built of cold-rolled steel, with an LED light source. The simplicity of the sconce makes it a perfect choice for bathroom vanities, dining rooms, living rooms, primary bedrooms, and entryways.

name: BEAM WALL SCONCE
description: The BEAM Wall Sconce is built from cold-rolled steel, and is diffused by a minimal frosted, 1" round acrylic rod. The fixture is lit with warm white LED strip and makes the perfect addition to bathroom vanities or any space requiring a low profile depth.

name: BICYCLE CHANDELIER - LINEAR
description: The BICYCLE Chandelier is composed of reclaimed bicycle frames, welded together to create a dynamic and cool fixture. This light is the perfect option for playful interiors looking for a sculptural edge.

name: BICYCLE CHANDELIER - ROUND
description:
The BICYCLE Chandelier is composed of reclaimed bicycle frames, welded together to create a dynamic and cool fixture.
This light is the perfect option for playful interiors looking for a sculptural edge.

name: CRISS CROSS INTEGRATED LED CHANDELIER
description: The CRISS-CROSS series was created from a genuine desire to blend art with lighting. It is a sculptural piece that is composed of cut steel rod, carefully arranged and welded in a seemingly random pattern. The CRISS-CROSS Integrated Chandelier is lit by LED strips integrated into the structure of the sculpture. The suspension cables can be adjusted on-site to have the sculpture float below the ceiling to any desired height.

name: CRISS-CROSS CHANDELIER
description: The CRISS-CROSS series was created from a genuine desire to blend art with lighting. It is a sculptural piece that is composed of cut steel rod, carefully arranged and welded in a seemingly random pattern. The CRISS-CROSS Chandelier is lit from a canopy mounted above the sculpture. The suspension cables can be adjusted on-site to have the sculpture float below the canopy to any desired height.

name: CRISS-CROSS PENDANT
description: The CRISS-CROSS Pendant is composed of artistically welded steel square rod.  Each piece is uniquely handmade and while similar, no two fixtures are alike.

name: CRISS-CROSS SCULPTURE (KIPS BAY)
description: no description available

name: GEM SINGLET PENDANT
description: The GEM Singlet is a versatile pendant that emits a warm glow from a hand-blown opal white glass diffuser. This pendant can be installed at various angles or can hang perfectly straight from its solid brass hardware. The GEM Singlet is a delicate form that would be suitable for use as a stand-alone pendant, or can be used in larger groupings to create a cascading effect.

name: GEM WALL SCONCE - CUSTOM
description: The GEM Wall Sconce is built of brass with an LED light source that is diffused by a hand-blown glass diffuser inspired by the shape of an abacus bead. Available in 1 or 2 Gem configurations.

name: GEM WALL SCONCE - FIXED ARM
description: Constructed of steel with an LED light source, the GEM Wall Sconce is embellished with a hand-blown glass diffuser evocative of an abacus bead. This variant of the Gem Sconce boasts a rigid arm, suitable for busy areas and commercial premises alike.

name: GEM1 PENDANT - LINEAR
description: The GEM1 Pendant is built of brass with an LED light source that is diffused by a hand-blown glass diffuser. This pendant works as an individual fixture or can be installed in larger groupings to create a dynamic installation.

name: GEM1 PENDANT - VERTICAL
description: The GEM1 Pendant is built of brass with an LED light source that is diffused by a hand-blown glass diffuser. This pendant works as an individual fixture or can be installed in larger groupings to create a dynamic installation.

name: GEM1 WALL SCONCE
description: The GEM1 Wall Sconce is built of brass with an LED light source that is diffused by a hand-blown glass diffuser inspired by the shape of an abacus bead.

name: GEM2 PENDANT - LINEAR
description: The GEM Pendant is built of brass with an LED light source that is diffused by a hand-blown glass diffuser. This pendant works as an individual fixture or can be installed in larger groupings to create a dynamic installation.

name: GEM2 PENDANT - VERTICAL
description: The GEM2 Pendant is built of brass with an LED light source that is diffused by a hand-blown glass diffuser. This pendant works as an individual fixture or can be installed in larger groupings to create a dynamic installation.

name: GEM2 WALL SCONCE
description: The GEM2 Wall Sconce is built of brass with an LED light source that is diffused by a hand-blown glass diffuser inspired by the shape of an abacus bead.

name: GEM3 PENDANT - LINEAR
description: The GEM3 Pendant is built of brass with an LED light source that is diffused by a hand-blown glass diffuser. This pendant works as an individual fixture or can be installed in larger groupings to create a dynamic installation.

name: HALO / CRISS-CROSS CHANDELIER
description: The HALO CRISS-CROSS Chandelier is a minimal hanging pendant internally lit by a warm white dimmable LED strip and installed with a custom CRISS-CROSS diffuser.

name: IRIS WALL SCONCE
description: The Iris Wall Sconce is a light fixture made from hand blown glass with an LED light source. The sconces are back-lit with warm white LED strip in the middle of the sconce which radiates outward to create a warm glow. The LED strip is contained by a plated steel disk that can be brushed or polished. Use as a stand-alone sconce or in groupings as a larger wall installation.

name: LEVEL WALL SCONCE
description:
The LEVEL Wall Sconce is built from cold rolled steel with an encompassed 1" frosted acrylic square rod that diffuses an LED light source. 
The simplicity of the sconce makes it a perfect choice for bathroom vanities, dining rooms, living rooms, master bedrooms, and entryways.

name: LEVEL/ CRISS-CROSS PENDANT
description:
The LEVEL/ CRISS-CROSS Pendant is built of cold-rolled steel with an LED light source that is diffused by a satin hand-rubbed acrylic diffuser.
The CRISS-CROSS element is suspended below as a decorative sculpture.

name: LUNA WALL SCONCE
description: The LUNA Wall Sconce is built from cold rolled steel and features an undulated hand-blown glass disk diffuser. The sconce is back-lit with a warm white LED strip. Its minimalistic steel construction and unique diffuser are the perfect pairing for a modern living space, adding warmth and texture to any room.

name: LUNETTE WALL SCONCE - RECTANGLE
description: The LUNETTE Wall Sconce is composed of a cold rolled steel body with a delicate armature projecting a frosted cast glass diffuser. This sconce is available in a variety of plated finishes and cast glass textures. The LUNETTE Wall Sconce is illuminated by a candelabra base socket which can be used with an incandescent or LED retrofit bulb.

name: LUNETTE WALL SCONCE - ROUND
description: The LUNETTE Wall Sconce is composed of a cold-rolled steel body with a delicate armature projecting a frosted cast glass diffuser. This sconce is available in a variety of plated finishes and cast glass textures. The LUNETTE Wall Sconce is illuminated by a candelabra base socket which can be used with an incandescent or LED retrofit bulb.

name: LUSTER MEDALLION - BACK-LIT
description: Custom sizes and shapes available.

name: LUSTER MEDALLION - UNLIT
description: Custom sizes and shapes available.

name: LUSTER PEARL PENDANT
description: The LUSTER Pearl Pendant is handcrafted from aluminum with an opal white glass globe diffuser. Each piece is individually sculpted by hand, so while similar no two pieces are alike. The effect is a stunning warm glow that works in residential, hospitality and commercial settings.

name: LUSTER PENDANT
description: The LUSTER Pendant is handcrafted from polished aluminum. Each piece is individually sculpted by hand, so while similar no two pieces are alike. The effect is a stunning warm glow that works in residential, hospitality and commercial settings.

name: LUSTER WALL SCONCE
description: The LUSTER Wall Sconce is handcrafted from polished gold aluminum.  Each piece is individually sculpted by hand so while similar no two pieces are identical. The effect is a stunning warm glow that works in residential, hospitality and commercial settings.

name: MIDNIGHT SUN
description: For trade pricing and custom orders please email info@ridgelystudioworks.com

name: MOVIMENTO CHANDELIER (RECTANGLE)
description: The MOVIMENTO Chandelier is composed of hand-cut art glass panels, delicately hung on a barely visible braided stainless steel line. The illusion of floating glass gives the fixture a whimsical feel. The light source can be mounted in the canopy of the fixture or integrated into the hanging glass. This contemporary chandelier works well in residential, hospitality, and commercial settings.

name: MOVIMENTO CHANDELIER (ROUND)
description: The MOVIMENTO Chandelier is composed of hand-cut art glass panels, delicately hung on a barely visible braided stainless steel line. The illusion of floating glass gives the fixture a whimsical feel. The light source can be mounted in the canopy of the fixture or integrated into the hanging glass. This contemporary chandelier works well in residential, hospitality, and commercial settings.

name: RAPTURE PENDANT
description: The RAPTURE Pendant is a dynamic grouping of geometric brake formed pendants with a two-tone finish to highlight the internal LED light source. The RAPTURE Pendant comes in groupings of 3, 5 and 7 formed diffusers. These can be suspended as single clusters or installed in larger groupings.

name: RAPTURE PENDANT - VERTICAL 8
description: The RAPTURE Pendant is a dynamic grouping of geometric brake formed pods with a two-tone finish to highlight the internal LED light source.

name: RAPTURE WALL SCONCE
description: The RAPTURE Wall Sconce is a dynamic grouping of geometric brake formed diffusers with a two-tone finish to highlight the internal light source. This fixture can be installed as a stand-alone wall sconce, or clustered in groupings to create a unique wall installation.

name: RAY SLIM WALL SCONCE
description: The RAY Wall Sconce is built from cold-rolled steel, and is diffused by a minimal frosted, round acrylic rod. The fixture is back-lit with warm white LED strip.

name: RAY WALL SCONCE
description: The RAY Wall Sconce is built from cold rolled steel, and is diffused by a minimal frosted, round acrylic rod. The fixture is back-lit with warm white LED strip.

name: REED LANDSCAPE LIGHT
description: The REED landscape fixture is a sculptural free standing fixture that uses a weather proof 50W low voltage (12V) bulb as the light source. It draws its inspiration from nature and is as much about the shadows it casts as the light it provides. Composed of steel rods in various thicknesses each REED is slightly different and although similar, no two are identical.

name: SPIRAL NEST - CASCADING 3 CHANDELIER
description: The SPIRAL NEST series is a happy accident born from a scribble in the artist’s notepad. It is composed of hand rolled steel rods in various thicknesses skillfully welded together. Each SPIRAL NEST is slightly different and although similar, no two are identical. These nests work well as stand alone pendants, small clusters, and cascading configurations and in larger groupings to create custom installations.

name: SPIRAL NEST - CASCADING 5 CHANDELIER
description: The SPIRAL NEST series is a happy accident born from a scribble in the artist’s notepad. It is composed of hand rolled steel rods in various thicknesses skillfully welded together. Each SPIRAL NEST is slightly different and although similar, no two are identical. These nests work well as stand alone pendants, small clusters, and cascading configurations and in larger groupings to create custom installations.

name: SPIRAL NEST - CASCADING 7 CHANDELIER
description: The SPIRAL NEST series is a happy accident born from a scribble in the artist’s notepad. It is composed of hand-rolled steel rods in various thicknesses skillfully welded together. Each SPIRAL NEST is slightly different and although similar, no two are identical. These nests work well as stand-alone pendants, small clusters, and cascading configurations and in larger groupings to create custom installations.

name: SPIRAL NEST - CLUSTER 3 CHANDELIER
description:
The SPIRAL NEST series is a happy accident born from a scribble in the artist’s notepad. It is composed of hand-rolled steel rods in various thicknesses skillfully welded together. Each SPIRAL NEST is slightly different and although similar, no two are identical. These nests work well as stand-alone pendants, small clusters, and cascading configurations and in larger groupings to create custom installations.

The SPIRAL NEST was awarded best in show by Interior Design Magazine at the ICFF in 2013.

Each SPIRAL NEST is slightly different and although similar, no two are identical. These nests work well as stand-alone pendants, small clusters, and cascading configurations and in larger groupings to create custom installations.

description: The SPIRAL NEST series is a happy accident born from a scribble in the artist’s notepad. It is composed of hand-rolled steel rods in various thicknesses skillfully welded together. Each SPIRAL NEST is slightly different and although similar, no two are identical. These nests work well as stand-alone pendants, small clusters, and cascading configurations and in larger groupings to create custom installations.

name: SPIRAL NEST CHANDELIER
description: The SPIRAL NEST Chandelier is composed of hand-rolled steel rods in various thicknesses, skillfully welded together. Inspired by a sketch in the artist's notebook, each Nest is slightly different, and although similar no two are identical. This contemporary chandelier works well in residential, hospitality, and commercial settings.

name: SPIRAL NEST PENDANT
description:
The SPIRAL NEST series is a happy accident born from a scribble in the artist’s notepad. It is composed of hand-rolled steel rods in various thicknesses skillfully welded together. Each SPIRAL NEST is slightly different and although similar, no two are identical. These nests work well as stand-alone pendants, small clusters, and cascading configurations and in larger groupings to create custom installations.

The SPIRAL NEST was awarded best in show by Interior Design Magazine at the ICFF in 2013.

name: STACK LED CHANDELIER
description: Starting with a sketch, the concept of a line drawing made of light drove the development of the Stack fixture. The Stack light’s design language creates a volumetric composition that can fill a large space without significant visual weight. The fixture retains a feeling of lightness by balancing geometric lines with negative space. The Stack light can be scaled to fit any space without compromising the form, providing unique lighting solutions for a variety of environments.

name: STACK LED WALL SCONCE
description: Produced entirely in-house, the STACK Wall Sconce utilizes modern LED technology in conjunction with brake formed steel channel to create an extremely robust product. This sconce is the perfect pairing to the STACK Chandelier.

name: STICK PENDANT
description: The STICK Pendant is composed of artistically welded steel round rod.  Each piece is uniquely handmade and while similar, no two fixtures are exactly the same.
